WorkItem.Description:
Thanks for selection fixing! But there are still minor issues.
Normally selection rectangle should not cross control/window area, so you can't select items that are not shown. But here I can start selecting items, move mouse up/down crossing control area, then release mouse button, items that are not visible will also be selected.
And also the scrolling speed while selecting is quite slow.

Comments.Message: Also another minor issue - usually mouse click on empty control area leads to selection clearance. Here you can also clear selection, by drawing selection rectangle in empty area, but click does nothing.

I've fixed the three issues. 

But I'm not sure about the scroll speed. I've increased it slightly by Setting up the scroll delta. You can experiment with the ScrollDelta/ScrollDelay fields of the AutoScroller.cs in order to suggest more appropriate values.

Delay is the time between scrollrequests, Delta the offset to scroll.
